message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this unique opportunity, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality you describe, $15000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $12000 at this time.  Let me know if that works for you.
